name: Palmr
description: Palmr is a fast and secure platform for sharing files, built with performance and privacy in mind.

notes.text: This LXC is very memory-hungry when updating; it requires at least 6GB RAM, but RAM may be reduced to as low as 2GB when running normally
To use a bind mount for storage, create symlinks to your mount for both `uploads` and `temp-uploads` in `/opt/palmr_data`
To use Palmr with a reverse proxy, uncomment `SECURE_SITE` in `/opt/palmr/apps/server/.env`
